Items.Title: Oversight – Status of the federally mandated Local Wellness Policy in NYC Public Schools
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Status of the federally mandated Local Wellness Policy in NYC Public Schools

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Department of Education to assess the impact of its decision to decrease milk choices in New York City’s public schools in order to evaluate the effect of this policy change on children’s milk consumption and nutrition.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Assess the impact of its decision to decrease milk choices in NYC’s public schools.
